title: Saucer, "Parade with Banners", 1930–40
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with raised rim; painted around the border with two sections of parades with people holding red inscribed banners, a thin gilded band around the outer rim and a striped brown/gilded band in inside.

tombstone.epitaph:
Saucer, "Parade with Banners", 1930–40.
1930–40. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-96.
